casebody.data:
Melissa SEMINARA and Carmelo Seminara, Petitioners
v.
Stuart DERSHAW, M.D. John Stack, M.D., Holy Redeemer Women's Care of Montgomery County, and Holy Redeemer Health System d/b/a Holy Redeemer Hospital and Medical Center, Respondents No. 610 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. February 21, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 21st day of February, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
